note.p: Birth: Chancery Lane, London, England (08 May 1698)
Profession: Bookseller; editor; therapist for deaf children
Medals/Prizes: Copley Medal 1744; founder of the Bakerian lecture
References: Marta Cavazza, 'The Institute of Science of Bologna and the Royal Society in the eighteenth century' in NR 2002 vol 56 pp 3-25, plate
W Johnson, 'Richard Jack and Henry Baker, FRS, in the Late Summer of 1746' in NR 1993 vol 47 pp 225-231
G L E Turner, 'Henry Baker, FRS: Founder of the Bakerian Lecture' in NR 1974-5 vol 29 pp 53-79, plate
